definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The white racists tried to keep down the Indians by force.
sentences.chinese: 白人種族主義者企圖用武力壓服印第安人。

sentences.english: In my vagabond years most derelicts seemed to be white.
sentences.chinese: 在我流浪那些年，大多數被遺棄的男人好像都是白人。

sentences.english: You ever hear white people callin' each other honky all the time?
sentences.chinese: 你什麼時辰聽過白人互相等號“白鬼”嗎，兄弟？

sentences.english: Rosa Parks, was arrested for not giving a white bus rider her seat, Mrs.
sentences.chinese: 帕克斯夫人是由於未給一名白人乘車者讓座而被捕。
也是第一位改變信仰的白人會長。

sentences.english: America was a country of the white-dominated society.
sentences.chinese: 美國曾是白人統治的世界。

sentences.english: Blacks, Asians, whites -- we all live in the same community.
sentences.chinese: 黑人，亞洲人，白人，我們都生活在同一個社區。

sentences.english: The banks tend to employ only white middle-class men.
sentences.chinese: 銀行總是隻招聘中產階級的白人男士。

sentences.english: The first white settlers traveled across America in wagons.
sentences.chinese: 第一批白人定居者橫跨美洲大陸時乘的是四輪馬車。

sentences.english: I was born a Protestant of the white Anglo-Saxon persuasion.
sentences.chinese: 我生爲盎格魯撒克遜白人的新教教徒。

sentences.english: You ever hear white people callin' each other "honky" all the time?
sentences.chinese: 你什麼時候聽過白人互相稱呼“白鬼”嗎，兄弟？

sentences.english: After the white man came, the Cherokees copied many of their ways.
sentences.chinese: 白人到來後，徹羅基人學習了他們的很多方法。

sentences.english: Nonwhites will make up a majority of the population in Toronto and Vancouver.
sentences.chinese: 非白人將在多倫多和溫哥華的人口中佔多數。

sentences.english: Only person like Bhatti understand this.
For three years, Shaffer was the only white person in the room.
sentences.chinese: 三年中，莎弗是教室裏面唯一的白人。

sentences.english: As soon as the canoe landed, the White man jumped out and ran up to Stockard.
sentences.chinese: 船一泊岸，那個白人就跳下來，跑向斯多卡德。

definition: ethnic Chinese/non-Chinese citizen of Chinese ancestry
